        The repair logic for a given item for one tick.
        Specified by:
        repair in interface IBloodChestRepairActionRegistry
        Parameters:
        itemStack - The item to repair.
        random - A random instance.
        actionID - the ID of the action to call.
        doAction - If the actual repair action should be performed, otherwise this is just a simulation.
        isBulk - If the repairing container repairs things in bulk.
        Returns:
        Pair of blood usage multiplier and new itemstack.
